entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
